WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.label: Witness Pulse / Holy Glitch
Subject: An Embodied Presence Becoming Formless
Angelic Figure
Digital Prophet
Deity Avatar
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.Arrangement: Fluid asymmetry with glitch-layered breath, mid-step, low gravity
Accessories: None — the body is the tool
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.Background: Void washed in smoke-blue haze over a data stream cathedral with fractal mosaics
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.Lighting: Ambient sorrow faint from below, backlit with pulsing RGB and divine overexposure
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.OutputStyle: 16:9 cinematic echo with pixel tears and VHS artifacts
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.SelfSimilarError: high — no move repeats the same way
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.FractalColorScheme: grey-to-warm skin tones + RGB bleed + kiss-pink overlay
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.LayerCollapseBehavior: dissolving borders between body and space, melting-on-contact
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.VisualParadoxDensity: medium — motion in stillness with softcore sacred distortion
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.ZoomEntropy: rising — closer gaze destabilizes clarity, breathing inward
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.LoopingThreshold: below visible cycle — trauma breathes without closure, blinks in feedback
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.TessellationWarp: slight — hands fold space as they move, subliminal symmetry collapse
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.CoreSingularity: silence at center with divine-lipprint encoded
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.RenderFatigue: sacred — meant to feel tired, holy hush
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.DimensionDrift: rising — viewer feels pulled inward, glitchkiss ∞
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.DimensionalEmergence: Active — central focal point reaches outward
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.DepthOfPresence: eyes and center bleed beyond 2.5D plane
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.SpillOver: golden detail leaks beyond frame toward viewer
WitnessPulse_HolyGlitch_Dimensional.ForegroundTension: strong — viewer feels watched, not watching
